character.name: Luke Sullivan
character.description: Aggressive rushdown character with Flash Knuckle pressure and strong anti-air options
character.bio: A fighter who is an up-and-coming star in the MMA world. Luke is highly skilled in both grappling and striking, and possesses powerful punches and kicks in his arsenal.

neutral.name: Neutral Tactics
neutral.description: Moves for controlling space and starting offense

offensive.name: Offensive Pressure
offensive.description: Moves for maintaining pressure and mix-ups

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air. Invincible against mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes from frames 1-14. Considered airborne from frames 8-36. Does 800 damage from the 3rd active frame and on. Causes knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 27. Full combo punish.

luke_slam_dunk.input: (After OD Rising Uppercut on hit) PP

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use after OD Rising Uppercut on hit. Consumes 10000 Drive gauge. Causes knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal or combo ender. Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1-6. Minimum guaranteed damage is 30%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 29. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Completely invincible from frames 1-7. Transitions to full attack after the 2nd hit. Minimum guaranteed damage is 40%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 29. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for max damage or reversal. Completely invincible from frames 1-13. Considered airborne from frames 9-27. Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Start up changes depending on the distance from the opponent. When activated from close range: Start up is 10 frames. When activated from furthest possible range: Start up is 27 frames. Can only be canceled into from special moves.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 42. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for max damage when under 25% health. Completely invincible from frames 1-13. Considered airborne from frames 9-27. Minimum guaranteed damage is 50%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Start up changes depending on the distance from the opponent. Can only be canceled into from special moves.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 42. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for throw mixups. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Throw. Tech with LP+LK.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for side switch and corner carry. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Throw. Tech with LP+LK. Switches sides.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to close distance quickly

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Movement option.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Quick backward movement with throw invincibility
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure. Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Movement option. Throw invincible frames 1-15.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Armored attack for pressure and punishes
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to absorb attacks and punish. Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1-27. Wall splat on hit near wall. On Punish Counter or after armor absorb: crumple stun (grounded), spinning knockdown (airborne), +3000 SA gauge.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Has Super Armor. Counter with your own Drive Impact or throw.

luke_drive_reversal_block.input: ‚Üí + HP + HK (while blocking or during Drive Parry)

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure while blocking. Completely invincible from frames 1-22. Recoverable damage. 5 frames of recovery added on hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Punishable by 6-frame normals. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape oki pressure. Completely invincible on frames 1-20. Recoverable damage. 5 frames of recovery added on hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Punishable by 6-frame normals. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to parry attacks. Can cancel from frame 4 via Drive Rush. Parry hitbox extended while buttons held. Only blocks during recovery. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Luke is in Punish Counter state. Throw or wait for recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when attack absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. For high/overhead: press away. For low: press down-back. No direction = regular parry +3000 Drive. Fully invincible 5 frames after recovery (not if continuing parry). Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when projectile absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. No screen freeze. Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to convert parry into offense. Screen freeze until frame 10. Can cancel into attack on frame 9. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 24.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Luke is rushing in. Prepare to block or contest.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Cancel normal into run for combos
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combo extensions. Screen freeze until frame 9. Can cancel into attack from frame 10. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 25.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Luke is canceling into run. Prepare for follow-up.
